code:
%% Timeline: Project roadmap showing milestones across quarters
%% Each section is a time period; entries are deliverables
%% Useful for stakeholder communication

timeline
    title Product Roadmap 2025

    section Q1 - Foundation
        Project kickoff           : Set up repo, CI/CD, and dev environment
        Core API                  : User auth, CRUD endpoints, database schema
        Design system             : Component library and style guide

    section Q2 - Core Features
        Task management           : Create, assign, and track tasks
        Real-time collaboration   : WebSocket-based live updates
        Beta launch               : Invite-only beta with 50 users

    section Q3 - Growth
        Integrations              : Slack, GitHub, and calendar sync
        Mobile app                : React Native app for iOS and Android
        Public launch             : Open registration and marketing site

    section Q4 - Scale
        Analytics dashboard       : Usage metrics and reporting
        Enterprise features       : SSO, audit logs, role-based access
        Performance optimization  : Caching, CDN, and database tuning

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 主架构 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 '主架构'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
